snippet.title: Star Stable: The Story of Jorvik
snippet.description:
The legend of Jorvik tells an epic story of magic, horses and unbreakable friendship. Are you the girl who will save the island from the dark times ahead?

DISCLAIMER: This video is an animated introduction to the back story of Star Stable. It is not representative of actual gameplay, and does not reflect or promise any changes to in-game graphics.

Check out this beautiful animated intro movie to learn all about the mystical beginnings of the back story behind the magical island of Jorvik!

Like Star Stable on Facebook! http://facebook.com/starstable
Follow Star Stable on Instagram!
http://instagram.com/starstableonline
Follow Star Stable on twitter! http://twitter.com/starstable
Follow us on Snapchat! StarStableSnap
Play Star Stable now at http://starstable.com
